title: Ticket #865: HDFS libexec files missing in condor release packages
description: Faisal and I just found that the 7.4.0 pre-release installed on CHTC does not contain any of the libexec/hdfs files. We are using the rhel3 build. It seems that something may be wrong with the way these files are copied into the release target.
remarks:
2009-Oct-19 11:40:29 by zmiller:
do this files live in condor_filetransfer_plugins or condor_hdfs? a couple weeks ago i disabled the compilation of condor_filetransfer_plugins, since it doesn't compile in the general sense. (it needs a special java setup)

2009-Oct-20 18:36:53 by faisal:
These doesn't live in filetransfer so it is related to hdfs daemon. I just did 'make public' on my workspace and tar that it generated contains the libexec directory with hdfs jars inside it. The libexec folder is the intended location for jar files.

Now, I am not sure what happened when deploying on CHTC cluster.

2009-Oct-21 09:29:36 by danb:
The libexec/hdfs directory containing the jar files is not in the 7.4.0 tarballs: 

$ tar tzf condor-7.4.0-linux-x86-rhel3-dynamic.tar.gz  | grep hdfs
condor-7.4.0/sbin/condor_hdfs

$ tar tzf condor-7.4.0-linux-x86-rhel5-dynamic.tar.gz | grep hdfs
condor-7.4.0/sbin/condor_hdfs

2009-Dec-28 10:25:58 by danb:
I still don't see any hdfs files other than condor_hdfs in 7.4.1. 

$ tar tzf condor-7.4.1-linux-x86-rhel5-dynamic.tar.gz | grep hdfs
condor-7.4.1/sbin/condor_hdfs

2010-Apr-06 17:55:54 by danb:
In the 7.4.2 condor packages that are about to be released, I still do not see any HDFS files other than condor_hdfs itself. Zach, can you please check my sanity?
2010-Aug-23 17:07:50 by adesmet:
Bulk change of target version from v070402 to v070404 using ./ticket_target_mover.

2010-Oct-07 01:06:58 by ilikhan:
It is available with 7.4.3 and later.

Should we mark this ticket resolved?

2010-Oct-27 16:39:01 by adesmet:
Bulk change of target version from v070404 to v070405 using ./ticket-target-mover.

Fix'd in cmake changes some time ago.
